titleStmt.title: Tubus historicus an historicall perspective; discovering all the empires and kingdomes of the vvorld, as they flourisht respectively under the foure imperiall monarchies. Faithfully composed out of the most approved authours, and exactly digested according to the supputation of the best chronologers. (With a catalogue of the kings and emperours of the chiefe nations of the world.) By the late famous and learned knight Sir Walter Raleigh.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.

titleStmt.title: Tubus historicus an historicall perspective; discovering all the empires and kingdomes of the vvorld, as they flourisht respectively under the foure imperiall monarchies. Faithfully composed out of the most approved authours, and exactly digested according to the supputation of the best chronologers. (With a catalogue of the kings and emperours of the chiefe nations of the world.) By the late famous and learned knight Sir Walter Raleigh.
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Benjamin Fisher,

notesStmt.note: With a frontispiece portrait of Charles II, the dedicatee, as a boy.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
